verses.name: 2 Chronicles 21:16
verses.text: Moreover the Lord stirred up against Jehoram the spirit of the Philistines, and of the Arabians, that were near the Ethiopians:

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 21:17
verses.text: And they came up into Judah, and brake into it, and carried away all the substance that was found in the king’s house, and his sons also, and his wives; so that there was never a son left him, save Jehoahaz, the youngest of his sons.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 21:18
verses.text: And after all this the Lord smote him in his bowels with an incurable disease.
